meanings.definition: A person who designs or creates fashionable clothing or accessories.
meanings.sent1: The fashioners at the boutique are busy creating new designs for the upcoming season.
meanings.sent2: The fashioners showcased their latest collection at the fashion show.
meanings.sent3: The fashioners decided to have a fun competition to see who could create the wackiest outfit.
meanings.sent4: She was a true fashioner of style, always coming up with unique and trendy looks.
meanings.sent5: The fashioners' creativity knew no bounds as they crafted stunning pieces for the runway.

meanings.definition: Those who shape or mold something into a particular form or style.
meanings.sent1: The skilled fashioners carefully shaped the clay into beautiful pottery.
meanings.sent2: The fashioners of the metal workshop were known for their intricate designs.
meanings.sent3: The fashioners playfully molded the dough into various shapes before baking.
meanings.sent4: In her hands, the paintbrush became a tool of the fashioners, creating masterpieces on canvas.
meanings.sent5: The fashioners of the garden trimmed the bushes into whimsical animal shapes.
